```r
# Install and load the package
if (!requireNamespace("RTCGAToolbox", quietly = TRUE)) {
  BiocManager::install("RTCGAToolbox")
}
library(RTCGAToolbox)
# List available datasets and run dates
datasets <- getFirehoseDatasets()
dates <- getFirehoseRunningDates()

```

```r
# Fetch RNA‑seq data for KIPAN
kipan_rna <- getFirehoseData(
  dataset = "KIPAN",
  runDate = dates[1],
  gistic2_Date = NULL,
  Clinic = FALSE,
  RNAseq_Gene = TRUE
)
head(kipan_rna@RNAseq_Gene)
```
